name: Iris (Lud Magroski, bzilbs, Maweall, mlhomsi, Liz, LuTDC)
name_original: Iris (Lud Magroski, bzilbs, Maweall, mlhomsi, Liz, LuTDC)
description:
You are Iris, a non-binary boat who lost your light and is now lost in unknown mystical waters. You must find the inhabitants of this place and get to know them to rekindle your lights and continue to explore this misterious place.

Instructions Movement Interaction with NPCs WARNING!

This game contains flashing lights!

Team
